text:
[Verse]
Walking through the night sky bright
Stars are shining heart takes flight
Wishing on a glowing light
Holding on with all my might

[Verse 2]
Moon above it seems so near
Guiding me dispelling fear
In the dark my way is clear
I can feel the magic here

[Chorus]
Starlight dreams come true tonight
Dancing in the silver light
In my heart I'm feeling right
Dreams are taking off in flight

[Verse 3]
Every step with you so sweet
Melody of stars complete
Happiness and joy we meet
Dancing to the cosmic beat

[Bridge]
When the night is calling us
Trust in this we'll never fuss
Love in starlight can't be rushed
With each moment futures brush

[Chorus]
Starlight dreams come true tonight
Dancing in the silver light
In my heart I'm feeling right
Dreams are taking off in flight
title: Starlight Dreams
